shortDescription: ParkingTabs Centralization and Smart Navigation Factory Enhancement
problem: ParkingTabs component had 200+ lines of duplicate configuration logic that should be centralized. Smart navigation factory needed extension for parking-specific features.
cause: Configuration was hardcoded in component instead of using centralized factory patterns. This violated DRY principles and made maintenance difficult.

solution.phase1: Analyzed ParkingTabs component and identified duplicate configuration
solution.phase2: Moved configuration to unified-tabs-factory for centralization
solution.phase4: Enhanced modal-select system with parking tabs support
solution.phase5: Refactored ParkingTabs to use centralized configuration

technicalDetails.centralization: All parking configuration now in unified-tabs-factory
technicalDetails.navigation: Smart navigation factory handles parking relations

notes: Major centralization effort - eliminated duplicate configuration and established single source of truth for parking tabs configuration. Follows enterprise factory patterns.
